title: Replace translation help/flag button with funny bold “Plan‑B” sign

requirements.text: Update the translation press-and-hold control in `frontend/src/quiz/QuizGameplay.tsx` (currently the English-flag icon with the small "hilfe" label) to display a funny-looking, bold "Plan-B" sign-style text instead of the flag image and "hilfe".

quotes: modify hilfe/flag button so that it is instead funny looking "Plan-B" text, funny sign with bold letters

acceptanceCriteria: The translation control no longer renders `/assets/generated/english-flag-icon-v2.dim_24x24.png` nor the "hilfe" label.
The control renders the text "Plan-B" with a visually distinct, sign-like styling (e.g., bold, bordered/badge-like treatment) that reads as intentionally funny.
The control remains located in the same place (right side of the question header area) and remains clickable/touchable.

requirements.text: Preserve existing translation behavior for the control (press/hold shows translation; release hides it), including disabled/loading behavior while translating, after swapping the UI to "Plan-B".

quotes: modify hilfe/flag button so that it is instead funny looking "Plan-B" text, funny sign with bold letters

acceptanceCriteria: Pointer/mouse/touch press-and-hold events continue to trigger translation exactly as before.
When `isTranslating` is true, the loading indicator still appears and the control is disabled (no translation toggling while disabled).

requirements.text: Ensure user-facing text associated with the control is in English (e.g., tooltip/title/aria-label) and reflects the new "Plan-B" presentation while still communicating the action (press and hold to translate to English).

quotes: Use English for any user-facing text in the build request.

acceptanceCriteria: No German label (e.g., "hilfe") is shown for this control.
The control has an English tooltip/title and/or aria-label that communicates the press-and-hold translation action.

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose existing components instead).
Keep backend unchanged; this is a frontend-only UI change.
Maintain the existing translation interaction model (press-and-hold to show, release to hide).
nonGoals: Do not change translation logic, caching behavior, or translation API configuration.
Do not add new authentication or routing changes.
Do not redesign unrelated parts of the quiz gameplay UI.
